body: Second story, Story: MC and FMC are childhood friends who promised to get together. They waited for the MC to graduate while the FMC got situated in college. While MC thinks of FMC he sees who he finds to be her but she’s pregnant and is being taken somewhere by someone. He tails them to find she is having sec with them and gets knocked out. He is then told that before FMC graduated, she made a deal with MC’s bullies to have sex with them so MC wouldn’t get bullied. She ends up pregnant and a slut and tries to go back to the MC but is turned away when she finds out MC is turned on by her being pregnant from someone else etc. She decides that she can’t go back to MC and continues having sex with other people. Months later a dvd is sent showing that the FMC is pregnant again and is happy with her life now while the MC says goodbye.
The story of page 23 to 38 is Netorare, right?
